The medallion does not need to be in this article. It has an article of its own. But if someone insists on a reduced version here, the place for it is at the end of this article.

Maria Skłodowska was *never* named Maria Curie-Skłodowska, see DISCUSSION
Changing back to "Nobel Prize in XXX". Both the WP article titles and http://nobelprize.org/nobel_prizes/physics/laureates/ agree on "in"; if there is a good reason to prefer "for", explain in Talk.
Nobel prize FOR -> Nobel prize IN. Hope I don't get in between the battle because of this ;)
